channel.title: [Class Suggestion] The Ghost(My Version)
channel.description:
> # [color=grey]The Ghost[/color] :shield: > **[color=grey]Neutral Special[/color]** > > **Passive (Afterlife)** - Immune to Occupation and Redirection. Immune to Death at Night. > **Passive (Afterlife)** - Can't talk during they day & can't vote.Can't write in LOGS. If The Ghost is killed , it will affect the killer(& his faction). > > **Day Ability (Dead Connection)** - Open a portal connecting the dead world with the living world. You will be able to talk for the rest of the day.(2 Uses - This doesn't affect dead players , only YOU can talk BUT you still can't vote.) > **Day Ability (Contact From The Grave)** - Talk to a player tonight privately. If the living player dies , you will get their class , with some additional effects improving their class. (Infinite Uses - Must contact a player until D3.) > > **Night Ability (Deadly Enemy)** - Make a player(besides the one that you are talking to) target another player.(3 Uses - Bypasses Redirection Immunity) > **Night Ability (Scare)** - Prevent all visits against your contacted player. (Infinite Uses) > **Night Ability (Remember)** - Remember a dead contacted player's class. > > **[color=darkred]Punishments for your killers & their factions[/color]** > **[color=darkred]Killers:[/color]** ***[color=steblue]Butler[Nightshade Wine][/color]*** , ***[color=steblue]Hunter[Wolf Companion][/color]*** , ***[color=steblue]Prince[Execute][/color]*** , ***[color=purple]Assassin[Assassinate][/color]*** , ***[color=gray]Reaper[Reap][/color]*** , ***[color=gray]King[Order Execution][/color]*** > > **[color=darkred]Punishments:[/color]** ***[color=steblue]Butler - Will no longer be able to use "Concentrated Wine" and may get incorrect feedback from their abilities[/color]*** , ***[color=steblue]Hunter - Will lose 1 charge of Every Ability [/color]*** , ***[color=steblue]Prince - Can no longer Execute[/color]*** , ***[color=purple]Assassin - Will not be able to kill for 2 nights and will not be able to use "2-1"[/color]*** , ***[color=gray]Reaper - Will not be able to Use "Icy Touch" & "Gather Darkness"[/color]*** , ***[color=gray]King - Will not be able to Use "Order Execution" & loses a charge of "Guards!"[/color]*** > > **[color=darkred]When The Ghost is executed in The Court:[/color]** There will be only 1 Trial per day for the rest of the game. >
> ***Effects gained upon getting a contacted player's that just died class :*** > ***[color=steblue]Butler[/color]*** - **(Expert in Winery)** Every other Night your abilities will bypass Occupation Immunity & you will get an extra charge of "Concentrated Wine". > ***[color=steblue]Court Wizard[/color]*** - **(Self-Helper)** You will get an extra charge of "Clear Mind" and "Tornado". "Clear Mind" can be used on yourself. > ***[color=steblue]Drunk[/color]*** - **(Realization)** If you debauch a player into you , you will get Night Immunity(If you get attacker). "Happy Hour" now tells you if you have got rid of Occupy Immunities. > ***[color=steblue]Hunter[/color]*** - **(Deadly Nature)** "Wolf Companion" now instantly kills targets. > ***[color=steblue]Knight[/color]*** - **(Second Chance)** You will live after killing one member of Blue Dragon BUT if you kill another one , you will take your own life as well. > ***[color=steblue]Mystic[/color]*** - **(The Thinker)** "Private Matter" & "Telepathy" gain one extra charge. "Conduit" will lose a charge but you can allow 3 players to talk at night. You will be able to hear them and talk to them. > ***[color=steblue]Noble[/color]*** - **(Loyalty)** All Abilities receive one more charge. > ***[color=steblue]Observer[/color]*** - **(Closer Look)**"Window Peek" now tells you the player's exact class. > ***[color=steblue]Paladin[/color]*** - **(Help From Above)** Your Abilities' Results can't be tempered with. (Frame , Brotherhood etc) > ***[color=steblue]Physician[/color]*** - **(A Secret Investigator)** Successfully healing a player identifies their killer. > ***[color=steblue]Prince[/color]*** - **(Hold on!)** Targets can be jailed one more night.(4 Nights) > ***[color=steblue]Princess[/color]*** - **(Inspection)** Will-of-Wisp now tells you who the target attacked. > ***[color=steblue]Sheriff[/color]*** - **(Master)** Your findings will be announced to the court daily. > > ***[color=purple]Alcoholic[/color]*** - **(Surprise)** Your Debauchery's second target will be occupied. > ***[color=purple]Assassin[/color]*** - **(Experienced Killer)** Your Poison can't be healed. Your "2-1" Ability will fail if either target is healed,Immune or you are prevented from visiting them. You will keep your "2-1" Ability and it will be used when 2 kills have been secured. > ***[color=purple]Aristocrat[/color]*** - **(Royalty)** You can no longer be Occupied. > ***[color=purple]Duchess[/color]*** - **(Treachery)** Your investigative target will show up as Unseen to the Sheriff & Observer. > ***[color=purple]Enforcer[/color]*** - **(Hired)** If you prevent an attacker from visiting your Unseen Members , you will kill them.(Bypassess Night Immunity , Can't Protect from King's "Order Execute" or Prince's "Execute") > ***[color=purple]Herbalist[/color]*** - **(The Court "Healer")** The First player that you defile will have their logs deleted. > ***[color=purple]Illusionist[/color]*** - **(3rd Dimension)** Your "Mind Warp" ability can no longer be protected from The Court Wizard. > ***[color=purple]Marshal[/color]*** - **(Secret Finder)** You can temper with your target's logs. When they die , they will show your fake logs instead of theirs. > ***[color=purple]Mastermind[/color]*** - **(Old Detective)** Your first convert can not be protected by The Court Wizard. > ***[color=purple]Nightwatch[/color]*** - **(Little Angel)** You will see who visits The Unseen. > ***[color=purple]Poacher[/color]*** - **(Toxic Traps)** Your Snare Traps can kill the player if they left their room.(Doesn't Bypass Night Immunity) > ***[color=purple]Sage[/color]*** - **(Trickery)** Your Tornadoes swap the Investigative results of players. > ***[color=purple]Servant[/color]*** - **(Poison Wine)** When you use "Concentrated Wine" , you will kill all visiting players. > > ***[color=darkred]Apostle[/color]*** - **(Spy with My Little Eye)** Whispers can be read by all Cult Members when using Cult Spy. > ***[color=darkred]Cult Leader[/color]*** - **(Devoted)** You are Immune To Occupation & Redirection. > ***[color=darkred]Invoker[/color]*** - **(Monstrous Person)** You will make a player looks as Cult to the Paladin & Observer. > ***[color=darkred]Ritualist[/color]*** - **(True Cultist)** If The Cult Leader targets only 1 player with "Eradicate" , you will guarantee that kill. > ***[color=darkred]Seeker[/color]*** - **(Demonic Eyes)** You gain an extra charge for all your abilities. > > ***[color=gray]Alchemist[/color]*** - **(Experienced Chemist)** Your "Emerald Potion" ability will cause Bleeding to the Target if the Target is Immune To Death. > ***[color=gray]Fool[/color]*** - **(Mercy)** All abilities against you will be "Prevented". > ***[color=gray]Inquisitor[/color]*** - **(Clarity)** You are forever Immune at Night. > ***[color=gray]Mercenary[/color]*** - **(Second Guard)** You will be Immune at Night while Protecting the King. > ***[color=gray]Possessor[/color]*** - **(Invisible Master)** Your visits will be hidden. > ***[color=gray]Reaper[/color]*** - **(Lord of Death)** Tempers with a reaped player's class. > ***[color=gray]Scorned[/color]*** - **(The Truth)** Your target's abilities will receive incorrect feedback. > ***[color=gray]Sellsword[/color]*** - **(Staring Eyes)** When you use "Intimidate" , you will be Immune at Night. > ***[color=gray]Sorcerer[/color]*** - **(Spell Caster)** Your "Circle of Death" will have different effects on the target person , depending on their class. ( Offensive classes will get "Occupied" , Killer classes will target the king , Support classes will target themselves and Investigative classes will receive incorrect feedback.)
> # **Mechanics** > If you "contact" a player N1 and that player gets Executed during the day , you will get their class at the beginning of the night. > > If you "contact" a player N1 and that player gets killed at night , you get their role the next day. > > >Do I win if I don't remember any classes? Yes , as long as one of your contacts is alive. > >The Ghost can NOT see Dead Chat.
> **Goal** : *Contacted player wins/survives or remember a role and fulfill it's win condition.* > **Goal(The "Ghost" Fool)** : *Get yourself publicly executed.*

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Ghost(My Version)
item.dc:creator: Lightsin
item.description:
NAOtheRitualist:

Night Ability (Deadly Enemy) - Make a player(besides the one that you are talking to) target another player.(3 Uses - Bypasses Redirection Immunity)
Night Ability (Scare) - Prevent all visits against your contacted player. (Infinite Uses)
Night Ability (Remember) - Remember a dead contacted player’s class.

thats 3 night abilities

Maybe try combining Contact From The Grave and Dead Connection, then either make Remember or Scare a day ability.

Though I have to say, I like this

Let me run through the punishments:

Butler- idk how you’d die from butler, unless your a ghostly king. but other then that, seems good.

Hunter- Seems Good

Knight- This seems more of a blessing than a curse, as with the normal ability, you attack then suicide. this is just an old Cold Steel (Unless you mean suicide and attack the BD in the same night, which I don’t know how its worse)

Prince - kinda like executing bd, ok

Assassin- Woah, no 2 night attacks and no 2-1? maybe just no attack for a night and no usage of 2-1. (if you attack ghost as assassin, will you be able to use 2-1 after the time limit?)

Reaper - feelsbadman. Maybe just lose a soul or 2 over ghost reap, but that feels harsh for a neutral killer, who really has no guaranteed allies.

Executed in court- Interesting. I like this. also is a counter to mass claiming

maybe some changes will be nice, but other then that, this idea is actually cool.

just reminds me of the machosist

Also First!!
